short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate questions based upon highlighted text (dorothymemoryapp.com)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using AI, we will generate study questions based upon your highlighted text.

Once the questions are generated, you can add them to a study set.

---

What is Dorothy? Dorothy is a spaced repetition tool that learns when you should study something and then delivers it to you in a daily quiz.

We predict, to the day, when you will forget the answer to a question.

We then quiz you on that question the day before, allowing you to get the most out of the time that you do spend studying and to help you keep every answer memorized.

Whether youâ€™re learning a new language, preparing for a graduate school exam, or so much more, Dorothy will help you not forget a single thing.
